definition: gullible/easily bullied/weak
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
see 可汗[ke4 han2]
to take unfair advantage of/to deceive/to cheat
you should not covet your friend's wife (idiom)
pinyin: peng2 you5 qi1 bu4 ke3 qi1

sentences.english: The Chinese people brook no indignity or insult.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民不可欺，不可辱。

sentences.english: Do not take our restraint for a sign of weakness.
sentences.chinese: 不要把我方的剋制看做是軟弱可欺。

sentences.english: To some people, the need for sleep is viewed as a sign of weakness.
sentences.chinese: 對一些人來說，對睡眠的需要被看作是軟弱可欺。
